nodes.text: Remlout was a male X'Ting who served as a loyal bodyguard to Trillot during the Clone Wars. Around 22 BBY, Remlout knew that Asajj Ventress never declined a challenge, and when she met Trillot, the bodyguard challenged the Dark Jedi. She accepted and vowed that she would not kill the X'Ting thug. After fighting, the bodyguard was crippled by Ventress through the Force.
